document_data.name: Folkwain
document_data.occupation: Commander of the [[Company of the Crushed Grapes]]
document_data.mainbody: Duke '''Folkwain''' was a portly mercenary commander and Lord [[Woren]]'s second-in-command in the city of [[Nimpeth]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]] ''circa'' [[1370 DR]].
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, Folkwain was tasked with the security of his home city, Nimpeth, one of the [[Free Cities of the Vilhon Reach]]. The noble [[fighter]] oversaw Nimpeth's many hired mercenary companies, used as guards, militia, and law enforcement by the city's government. This included Duke Folkwain's own [[Company of the Crushed Grapes]], a special force under his control that included over 250 footmen and 150 cavaliers.
